item.title: Thinking of starting a business?
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: Conall O’Morain from the Sunday Business Show on TodayFM left a comment on the Argolon blog to let me know about their edition this Sunday. It’s all about “Starting Your Own Business”. As Conall said: We will have advice from Enterprise Ireland, the CEBs and one of the countryâ€™s wisest business advisers with us as [...]
item.content:encoded:
Conall O’Morain from the Sunday Business Show on TodayFM left a comment on the Argolon blog to let me know about their edition this Sunday. It’s all about “Starting Your Own Business”. As Conall said:

We will have advice from Enterprise Ireland, the CEBs and one of the countryâ€™s wisest business advisers with us as well.

If you are thinking about the leap, maybe this will be the trigger to do something about it? 10.30am this Sunday and streamed live here.
